pr_title: DPC-1199: Cancel button on Enable/Edit API page not working

timeline.message: Changed cancel links to hard url paths for edit user and registered org forms
Changed 'Cancel' url links for organization forms

timeline.bodyText:
I should have looked at your PR first before creating my own >_<
I ended up finding this one while testing the web app. I changed it to internal_user_path(@user) so that the Cancel button would put you back to the user page from where the edit was originally called. Let me know if that isnt correct behavior and I can remove that myself.
timeline.author: SMLuthi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -107,7 +107,7 @@
 
       <div class="ds-l-col--9 field-group__fields ds-u-border--0">
         <%= f.submit "Update user", class: "ds-c-button ds-c-button--primary", data: { test: "user-form-submit" } %>
-        <%= link_to "Cancel", :back, class: "ds-c-button ds-c-button--transparent" %>
+        <%= link_to "Cancel", internal_organizations_path, class: "ds-c-button ds-c-button--transparent" %>

replies.bodyText: Ah, no that's the right one :) I'll remove this edit so your PR can take care of it.
replies.author: Sun-Mountain
